page.title: 15RECREATION IN BROUGHTON
page.content: THERE ARE LOTS OF DIFFERENT CLUBS AND GROUPS IN BROUGHTON THAT PEOPLE CAN JOIN IN THEIR SPARE TIME:ETHIOPIA APPEAL,EVENING CLASSES,BROUGHTON MOTHERS CLUB,BROUGHTON CHURCH AND HOME GROUP,BROUGHTON C.P.SCHOOL P.T.A., BROUGHTON UNDER 5Â£S ASSOCIATION, BROUGHTON W.I.,BROUGHTON OVER 60Â£S CLUB, BROUGHTON OLD FOLK ENTERTAINMENT COMMITTEE, GUIDES,BROWNIES, MOTHER AND TODDLER GROUP, 2ND BROUGHTON CUBS,YOUTH CLUB, SCOUTS, KARATE CLUB,BROUGHTON CRICKET CLUB,RED LION,WORKING MENÂ£S CLUB,BROUGHTON WANDERERS, BROUGHTON PARISH CHURCH,BROUGHTON BAPTIST CHAPEL, SCHOOL WATCH GROUP,BROUGHTON ACTION RESEARCH FOR THE CRIPPLED CHILD,WOMENS ROYAL VOLUNTARY SERVICE, ROYAL BRITISH LEGION POPPY APPEAL, OLD FOLKS PARCEL FUND AND THE VILLAGE HALL PLAYING FIELD ASSOCIATION.
